TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Manipulation2DStartedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: Represents data that is sent with a event.

remarks.format:
## Examples In the following example, an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Started> event checks to see if inertia processing is running and if so, stops it.
[!code-csharp[ManipulationAPI#_ManipulationItem_OnManipulationStarted](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/manipulationapi/cs/manipulationitem.xaml.cs#_manipulationitem_onmanipulationstarted)]
[!code-csharp[ManipulationAPI#_ManipulationItem_Timestamp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/manipulationapi/cs/manipulationitem.xaml.cs#_manipulationitem_timestamp)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OriginX As Single
public: property float OriginX { float get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets the x-coordinate of the origin.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The origin point represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DStartedEventArgs.OriginX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DStartedEventArgs.OriginY%2A> properties is the average position of all manipulators associated with an element.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OriginY As Single
public: property float OriginY { float get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets the y-coordinate of the origin.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The origin point represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DStartedEventArgs.OriginX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DStartedEventArgs.OriginY%2A> properties is the average position of all manipulators associated with an element.
